ComicInfo.Title: Orders; Amateur Artists; Channel Fem-9; Land of the Free; A Visit to the Beach; Help! Wanted; Hypnotism; Everything of the Month Clubs; Water Shortage; Throughout History with Home Movies
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.A scientist orders his monster to kill a beautiful woman. Instead he kills the scientist and romances the woman.
In which the stars of 'The Nurses' are sent to appear in episodes of 'Car 54, Where Are You?', 'The Defenders', 'The Twilight Zone', 'Dennis the Menace', 'Sgt. Bilko', 'The Many Loves of Dobie Gillis', 'Gunsmoke', 'Route 66', and 'The Untouchables'.
The great jungle hero calls on the animals of the wild to save him. A monkey and two turtles are the only animals to react.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:38:30. [Issue ID 250399]
